description:
City of New Orleans/Orleans Parish boundary polygon. Boundary has been split between the area that is mostly land and the area extending into Lake Pontchartrain. 

Basis: Code of the City of New Orleans, Louisiana; Part I - Charter; Article I, Section 1-103.

metadata.attribution: City of New Orleans – Office of Information Technology & Innovation, Enterprise Information Team

name: NOLA Boundary
